meta.title: NovaFlow - AI-Powered Task Management
meta.description: NovaFlow helps teams organize their tasks with artificial intelligence in a simple and fast way.

hero.title: Organize your tasks with artificial intelligence
hero.subtitle: NovaFlow helps teams manage their projects efficiently with AI-powered insights and automation.

features.title: Powerful Features
features.subtitle: Everything you need to manage your tasks efficiently
features.aiInsightsDesc: Get intelligent recommendations and insights to optimize your workflow
features.smartAutomationDesc: Automate repetitive tasks and focus on what matters most
features.teamCollaborationDesc: Work together seamlessly with real-time updates and notifications
features.advancedAnalyticsDesc: Get insights into team productivity, project progress, and performance metrics with beautiful, actionable dashboards

testimonials.title: What our customers say
testimonials.subtitle: Trusted by teams worldwide
testimonials.quote1: NovaFlow's AI suggestions have completely transformed how our team prioritizes tasks. We're 40% more productive and never miss important deadlines anymore.
testimonials.quote2: The automation features are incredible. NovaFlow handles all the repetitive stuff so we can focus on what really matters. Game changer for our startup!
testimonials.quote3: Finally, a task management tool that actually understands our workflow. The analytics help us make better decisions and the team loves the interface.
